title: Ep 155 | Phil's First Duck Hunt with His Daughter, Satanic Soccer Mom, and the Snake in the Garden
description:
Phil and the boys took Phyllis out for her first duck hunt, and Phil kept a close eye on her. Phil remembers the time 2-year-old Jase swiped a wood duck and where they found it. Phil, Jase, and Al talk duck lice, Phil's attitude toward gators, and whether the serpent in the Garden of Eden was a real snake. And Phil takes on the logic of the mom whose ungodly politics led her to join the Satanic Temple.
